attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After 1 million Tibetan men , women and children were killed during the invasion of 1959, the chinese government

continues to support the tyrrany ongoing in Tibet.

World leaders must stand up to the brutal chinese regime torturing
the world's most peaceful people in Tibet and Burma

Please support a Free Tibet

and help those inside Tibet gain access to freedom

Thank you

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
